Submodules

pyfemtet.core module

exception pyfemtet.core.FemtetAutomationError[ソース]

ベースクラス: Exception

Exception raised for errors in automating Femtet.

exception pyfemtet.core.MeshError[ソース]

ベースクラス: Exception

Exception raised for errors in the meshing.

If this exception is thrown during an optimization calculation, the process attempts to skip that attempt if possible.

exception pyfemtet.core.ModelError[ソース]

ベースクラス: Exception

Exception raised for errors in the model update.

If this exception is thrown during an optimization calculation, the process attempts to skip that attempt if possible.

exception pyfemtet.core.SolveError[ソース]

ベースクラス: Exception

Exception raised for errors in the solver.

If this exception is thrown during an optimization calculation, the process attempts to skip that attempt if possible.

pyfemtet.dispatch_extensions module

exception pyfemtet.dispatch_extensions.DispatchExtensionException[ソース]

ベースクラス: Exception

exception pyfemtet.dispatch_extensions.FemtetConnectionTimeoutError[ソース]

ベースクラス: DispatchExtensionException

Raises when connection trials is timed out.

exception pyfemtet.dispatch_extensions.FemtetNotFoundException[ソース]

ベースクラス: DispatchExtensionException

Raises when (specific) Femtet process doesn’t exist.

class pyfemtet.dispatch_extensions.IFemtet[ソース]

ベースクラス: object

IDispatch object to contact with Femtet.

Usage:
>>> from win32com.client import Dispatch
>>> from femtetutils import const
>>> Femtet = Dispatch(const.CFemtet)
>>> print(Femtet.Version)

or

>>> from win32com.client import Dispatch
>>> Femtet = Dispatch('FemtetMacro.Femtet')
>>> print(Femtet.Version)

This is just an dummy class for type hint. More detail usage, see Femtet Macro Help.

pyfemtet.dispatch_extensions.dispatch_femtet(timeout=120, subprocess_log_prefix='') → Tuple[IFemtet, int][ソース]

Connect to existing Femtet process.

パラメータ:

  • timeout (int or float, optional) – Seconds to wait for connection. Defaults to DISPATCH_TIMEOUT.

  • subprocess_log_prefix (str, optional) – The prefix of log message.

例外:

FemtetConnectionTimeoutError – Couldn’t connect Femtet process for some reason (i.e. Femtet.exe is not launched).

戻り値の型:

Tuple[IFemtet, int]

pyfemtet.dispatch_extensions.dispatch_specific_femtet(pid, timeout=120) → Tuple[IFemtet, int][ソース]

Connect Femtet whose process id is specified.

This is a wrapper function of dispatch_specific_femtet_core. When this function is called by dask worker, the connection is processed exclusively.

パラメータ:

  • pid (int) – Process id of Femtet that you want to connect.

  • timeout (int or float, optional) – Seconds to wait for connection. Defaults to DISPATCH_TIMEOUT.

例外:

  • FemtetNotFoundException – Femtet whose process id is pid doesn’t exist.

  • FemtetConnectionTimeoutError – Connection trial takes over timeout seconds by some reason.

戻り値の型:

Tuple[IFemtet, int]

pyfemtet.dispatch_extensions.dispatch_specific_femtet_core(pid, timeout=120) → Tuple[IFemtet, int][ソース]

Connect Femtet whose process id is specified.

警告

Once Femtet is connected a python process, the python process can only connect it during the process lifetime even if the process runs this function.

サンプル

If you have 2 free Femtet processes (their pid is 1000 and 1001), you can only connect to first connected Femtet and cannot change the connection.

>>> from pyfemtet.dispatch_extensions import dispatch_specific_femtet
>>> Femtet1, pid1 = dispatch_specific_femtet(pid=1000)
>>> print(pid1)  # 1000
>>> Femtet2, pid2 = dispatch_specific_femtet(pid=1001)
>>> print(pid2)  # not 1001, but 1000

If you want to reconnect another process, please restart python script or interpreter.

If you want to connect 2 more Femtet processes from single script or interprete, please consider parallel processing.

パラメータ:

  • pid (int) – Process id of Femtet that you want to connect.

  • timeout (int or float, optional) – Seconds to wait for connection. Defaults to 10.

例外:

  • FemtetNotFoundException – Femtet whose process id is pid doesn’t exist.

  • FemtetConnectionTimeoutError – Connection trial takes over timeout seconds by some reason.

戻り値の型:

Tuple[IFemtet, int]

pyfemtet.dispatch_extensions.launch_and_dispatch_femtet(timeout=120, strictly_pid_specify=True) → Tuple[IFemtet, int][ソース]

Launch Femtet by new process and connect to it.

パラメータ:

  • timeout (int or float, optional) – Seconds to wait for connection. Defaults to DISPATCH_TIMEOUT.

  • strictly_pid_specify (bool) – If True, try to connect the launched femtet process strictly. If False, launch new process but try to connect any connectable femtet.

例外:

  • FemtetNotFoundException – Launched Femtet is not found for some reason (i.e. failed to launch Femtet).

  • FemtetConnectionTimeoutError – Connection trial takes over timeout seconds by some reason.

戻り値の型:

Tuple[IFemtet, int]

pyfemtet.logger.get_logger(logger_name)[ソース]

Return a logger with a default ColoredFormatter.
